topic.title: Local machine inventory
topic.shortdesc: How to do a local machine inventory

body.p: You can generate a local inventory of a machine in XML (file generated is like computername.ocs):
on Windows, you must first go in the FusionInventory-Agent installation directory and then in the perl/bin subdirectory: perl fusioninventory-agent --local c:\temp
You can generate a local inventory of a machine in HTML (file generated is like computername.html) :
To perform an HTML inventory, add the --html switch: fusioninventory-agent --local /tmp --html
